channel.title: Scholarship on Dominique Girard, Psy.D/Ph.D
channel.description: Recent content in Scholarship on Dominique Girard, Psy.D/Ph.D

item.title: Extension to my FRQSC scholarship to publicize and promote the results of my postdoctoral research
item.author: dominique.girard@radboudumc.nl (Dominique Girard, Psy.D/Ph.D)
item.description: In July 2023, the Fonds de Recherche du Québec – Société et Culture (FRQSC) awarded me a Knowledge Mobilization Plan (B3ZR) postdoctoral fellowship.
